channel.title: Server help Frustrating Please
channel.description: This has really been Frustrating me. Ive been hosting my server, no-ip duc... Its online, and everything.. on the status list. the day i list it, its 100% Online. So, Overnight... i leave it all up and everything... Next day, its offline.. and its at 49% At the Moment, but online. I need help with this please, anybody. does anybody have the same problem also? What's causing it to go down over night? Thanks ;D

item.title: Server help Frustrating Please
item.dc:creator: @ug1yw4t3rm3l0n ug1yw4t3rm3l0n
item.description:
@ug1yw4t3rm3l0n wrote:

get an auto restarter so if it turns off, it can restart it on for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Server help Frustrating Please
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

problem solve this yourself…because noone else can come to your house and try and see whats going on…just start it early in the morning and let it run all day and you should get the errors caught and be able to read them…just check it every 15 mins or somthing

Read full topic
